name: Toggle (piptastic, Mantis)
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 154, with the theme of "Vulnerable Invincible."

Capture objectives and shoot down enemies to accumulate points, but be careful - just one hit and you're dead! You can turn on your ship's shields to go invincible, but doing so will also make all enemies invincible, as well... 

Objectives must be captured while both you and your enemies are vulnerable, so good luck!

Controls:

  • Move with WASD, shoot with LMB
  • Toggle invincibility with 'SPACE'
  • Capture points by hovering over them while VULNERABLE
